summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5700 for the improvement of East 65th Street (South Side Only), from 26th Avenue Northeast to 28th Avenue Northeast; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75355, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
